line_1: Of these no Realm, from Lapland to Japan,
line_2: Displays such Numbers, as Hibernia can.

line_1: That pictured wealth of China and Japan,
line_2: Like its cold mistress, shunn'd the eye of man.

line_1: No matter where, in China or Japan,
line_2: Once on a time, an Emp'ror, a wise man,
That owns the Name of Man.
